data.text: @StarAdvertiser The government can't say to stop wearing masks.

@StarAdvertiser Why drop the vaccine passports but keep the indoor mask mandate?  This is asinine.  How much corruption and govt waste is going on with these COVID testing sites?  Follow the money and you will see why Ige and his crew are still pushing for testing and masks.
